Title: Argentina’s IEASA seeks 13 July LNG cargoes for delivery to Escobar, Bahia Blanca
Description: Argentina’s state-owned energy firm IEASA has issued a tender to buy 13 LNG cargoes for delivery in July to its 6.1 mtpa Escobar and 3.7 mtpa Bahia Blanca LNG import terminals. The tender closes on May 23.
Author: CK

Title: Snohvit LNG’s restart pushed back by a week due to compressor fault
Description: Norway’s state-owned Equinor has pushed back the targeted restart of its shuttered 4.2 mtpa Snohvit LNG plant by a week from today due to a “minor fault” on a compressor, the firm said.
Author: CK

Title: PGNiG signs initial agreement with Sempra for 3 mtpa of US LNG over 20 years
Description: Poland’s state-owned utility PGNiG has signed a heads of agreement (HOA) to buy a total of 3 mtpa of LNG on a free-on-board (FOB) basis over 20 years from US energy firm Sempra’s proposed Cameron LNG Phase 2 and Port Arthur LNG projects in the US.
Author: CK
